patthana19.15:1.1: Naajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana19.15:2.1: Nabahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana19.15:4.1: Naajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana19.15:5.1: Nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana19.15:6.1: Naajjhattārammaṇañca nabahiddhārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana19.15:7.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā dve …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate cha.
